subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/MIKES-DEAD-2-EVP.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : Went back to the Park today (2 days later) I was incorrect.....the Parks name was Pioneer Park. Any way, I got another evp recording. The little girl says "Mikes Dead" then I hear a man say "Oh Shit" Then I hear another person (not sure man or woman) say "I'll Go Get.........." (I can't understand the last words) anyone can hear this??  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/MIKES-DEAD-2-EVP.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
